content: my blueberry hat crochet pattern by nadine borovicka http //nadinescrafts blogspot com http //nadinespatterns blogspot com this pattern was inspired by the hat that norah jones wears at the end of the movie my blueberry nights maybe if you make it you ll get to kiss jude law too although it hasn t happened to me yet materials size h crochet hook 1 skein patons classic merino wool in jade heather- this yarn matches the movie the best that i could tell but you could substitute any worsted weight yarn you like abbreviations chain- chain single_crochet- single_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet treble_crochet- treble/triple crochet st s - stitch es directions  i like to start with a magic magic_ring to prevent a hole from forming make a magic_ring chain 3 11 double_crochet in ring join and tighten 12 sts  chain 3 double_crochet in joining 2 double_crochet in each st around join 24 sts  chain 3 double_crochet in joining double_crochet * 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st repeat from * around join 36 sts  chain 3 double_crochet in joining double_crochet in next 2 sts * 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts repeat from * around join 48 sts  chain 3 skip joining st double_crochet in each st around join 48 sts  chain 3 double_crochet in joining double_crochet in next 3 sts *2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from * around join 60 sts  chain 3 skip joining st double_crochet in each st around 60 sts  chain 3 double_crochet in joining double_crochet in next 4 sts *2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 4 sts repeat from * around join 72 sts  chain 3 skip joining st double_crochet in each st around 72 sts 6 times you can do more or less of these row to lengthen or shorten the hat  c 1 single_crochet in same st as joining * skip next 2 sts treble_crochet 3 double_crochet treble_crochet in next st skip next 2 sts# single_crochet in next st repeat from * around ending at # join to first single_crochet with a slip_stitch  fasten_off and weave in ends  go find jude law s diner and have some blueberry pie this pattern chart and photos are property of nadine borovicka all rights reserved pattern is available for personal use only pattern may not be sold or used to produce items for sale without express written permission from the designer © copyright 2009 by nadine borovicka
